name: nodejs-cluster-pm2-rabbitMQ-redis-nginx
description: - In software we perform two types of Operation   - Non-blocking operations   - Blocking operations - Non-blocking operations:   - Non-blocking refers to code that doesn't block execution.   - any operations which are non-blocking in nature are performed in L1, L2 and L3 cache   - bacically in RAM   - number of cycles requires are very less   - example : mathematical calculations - Blocking operations:   - number of cycles requires are millions   - ex: data-base operations, file i/o operations, network operations   - js engine is single threaded i.e- one execution stack in js
